titleStmt.title: The sea-man's answer to his unkind lover. Tune of. I lov'd you dearly, &c. Or, Languishing swain. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by T. Staples.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Verse: "Fair maid, you say you lov'd me well ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
